pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Analysis for Neuroimaging Data // Several functions can be used to analyze neuroimaging data using multivariate methods based on the 'msma' package. For more details, please see Kawaguchi et al. (2017) doi:10.1093/biostatistics/kxx011 and Kawaguchi (2019) DOI:10.5772/intechopen.80531.
